submission:
class Solution:
    def minFlips(self, a: List[List[int]]) -> int:
        m, n = len(a), len(a[0])
        m2 = m // 2
        n2 = n // 2
        if m * n < 4: return sum(a[i][j] for i in range(m) for j in range(n))
        res = 0
        for i in range(m2):
            for j in range(n2):
                cnt = [0, 0]
                for x in (a[i][j], a[-1 - i][j], a[i][-1 - j], a[-1 - i][-1 - j]):
                    cnt[x] += 1
                res += min(cnt)
        if m % 2 == 0 and n % 2 == 0: return res
        if n % 2 == 0:
            b = a[m2]
            s = sum(b)
            if len(b) < 4: return res + s
            t = sum(b[j] != b[-1 - j] for j in range(n2))
            return res + t + (2 if t == 0 and s % 4 else 0)
        if m % 2 == 0:
            b = [a[i][n2] for i in range(m)]
            s = sum(b)
            if len(b) < 4: return res + s
            t = sum(b[i] != b[-1 - i] for i in range(m2))
            return res + t + (2 if t == 0 and s % 4 else 0)
        res += a[m2][n2]
        b1 = a[m2]
        s1 = sum(b1) - a[m2][n2]
        t1 = sum(b1[j] != b1[-1 - j] for j in range(n2))
        b2 = [a[i][n2] for i in range(m)]
        s2 = sum(b2) - a[m2][n2]
        t2 = sum(b2[i] != b2[-1 - i] for i in range(m2))
        s = s1 + s2
        t = t1 + t2
        if len(b1) + len(b2) - 2 < 4: return res + s
        return res + t + (2 if t == 0 and s % 4 else 0)
